addAddress(address).details: adds a given address to the whitelist

returns.amount: the amount of the collateral need for minting
amount of collateral to be returned

returns._0: US price per a collateral token
US price per a synthetic token

params._registryAddress: the address of the registry contract

isWhitelisted(address).details: returns true if a given address is whitelisted, false if not

returns._0: true if the address is whitelisted, false if not

params._maxCollateralAmount: cap. amount of token that can be sent out from the wallet

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._minAmount: min. amount of collateral token expects to receive

removeAddress(address).details: removes a given address from the whitelist

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: A contract to collaterizes ERC-20 and mints NFT

estimateMint(uint8,uint8,uint256).notice: calculate amount of collateral assets to be placed for minting the NFT

estimateRedeem(uint8,uint8,uint256).notice: calculate amount of collateral assets to be returned when burning NFT

getCollateralPrice(uint8).notice: call the price feeder registry to retrieve the latest price of collateral token

getSyntheticPrice().notice: call the price feeder registry to retrieve the latest price of NFT

globalCollatelizationRatio().notice: looks for the system collateral ratio basically calculates from total collateral deposited / total NFT minted

mint(uint8,uint8,uint256,uint256).notice: taking collateral tokens to mint the NFT

redeem(uint8,uint8,uint256,uint256).notice: burning NFT and returning collateral assets, the offset fee will be charged when CR < 1

variantCollatelizationRatio(uint8).notice: calculates the collateral ratio for particular variant
